## ConnectionChecker.doDragChecks() method

Check whether this connection can be made by dragging.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
doDragChecks(a: RenderedConnection, b: RenderedConnection, distance: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection.md) | Connection to compare. |
|  b | [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection.md) | Connection to compare against. |
|  distance | number | The maximum allowable distance between connections.  True if the connection is allowed during a drag. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
